Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}} {{wikipedia|Bird}} [[File:Bird_Diversity_2011.png|thumb|250px|{{m|ja|鳥|tr=tori}}: various kinds of '''[[bird|birds]]'''.]]
{{ja-kanjitab|とり|yomi=k}} {{IPAfont|⟨to2ri⟩}} → {{IPAchar|/tori/}} From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=とり|-}}. Probably cognate with {{cog|okm|-}} {{m|ko|ᄃᆞᆰ|tr=tolk}}, modern {{cog|ko|닭||fowl; chicken}}. May also be related to the {{cog|ja|-}} verb {{m|ja|飛ぶ|tr=tobu||to fly}}.
